title: uNmai inraindEn
sahitya:
uNmai inrarindEn unadaDi paNindEn umaiyAL panganE Ongak-kazhal kaNNanE


anupallavi

  maNNilen tuyarellAm magizhndavan pOlirundAi kaNNilai unakkenrEn kaDum paghai nIyenrEn


caraNam    iDarellAm tAngAmal EnginEn shAntiyil eNNamik-kaDaindEn iniyavai purindEn 
puDamiDum pon pOlap-puttoLi paDaittEn pOndevelAm aruL pudaitta un sheyalennum
